structure.unit: STATE AND FEDERAL HIGHWAYS -- LIMITED ACCESS FACILITIES -- TURNPIKES -- ROAD BONDS -- BILLBOARDS -- RECYCLERS

law.catch_line: Bed and breakfast establishments, shopping malls, and shopping areas eligible to obtain specific service highway signs.
law.text: All statutes to the contrary notwithstanding, the Transportation Cabinet shall amend its policies and administrative regulations in effect on June 24, 2003, governing highway signage, to include bed and breakfast establishments, shopping malls, and shopping areas as businesses that are eligible to obtain a specific service highway sign, and shall not subsequently adopt new policies or promulgate new administrative regulations to the contrary.
law.history: Amended 2003 Ky. Acts ch. 57, sec. 1, effective June 24, 2003. -- Created 2002 Ky. Acts ch. 298, sec. 1, effective July 15, 2002.
